enchantment.stellarity.ambush.descriptio: Provoca daño extra a los mobs que no están apuntándote activamente
enchantment.stellarity.dune_speed.descri: Incrementa la velocidad de movimiento en la Arena
enchantment.stellarity.levitation_shot.d: Chance de disparar Flechas de Levitación
enchantment.stellarity.mighty_wind.descr: Bendecido por los Vientos de las Dunas
enchantment.stellarity.plated.descriptio: Incrementa la defensa, pero ralentiza la velocidad de vuelo
enchantment.stellarity.prismatic_pearl_r: Technical Enchant that makes the Prismatic Pearl return to the player because it was the most efficient way to handle right click detection
enchantment.stellarity.void_shot.descrip: Los disparos reducen la HP máxima del enemigo temporalmente
enchantment.stellarity.void_strike.descr: Los ataques reducen la HP del enemigo temporalmente
stellarity.advancements.absolute_devotio: Upgrade your Netherite Hoe to its Shulker version. At this point, it's just pure madness...
stellarity.advancements.ambrosia.descrip: Transmute any applicable food item into its divine variant, and then eat it to gain a permanent buff
stellarity.advancements.anger_enderman.d: Enrage an Enderman by looking at it
stellarity.advancements.aota_intro.descr: Toss any Enchanted Book over the Altar of The Accursed to imbue it with the darkest of magic
Eat every food item added by Stellarity, good or bad.
Use Tamaris to execute a mob with low health
stellarity.advancements.champions_ballad: Can't fight a Dragon without some good tunes!
stellarity.advancements.charge_anchor_en: Charge a Respawn Anchor in The End. You can use it to set your respawn point there just like in The Nether
stellarity.advancements.color_a_shulker_: Color a Shulker Box any color you want
stellarity.advancements.conqueror.descri: Destroy all protective End Crystals and fully conquer an End City
...and fuse it with some Blaze Powder
Use the Altar of The Accursed to craft some of the most powerful of gear
Destroy a protective End Crystal of an End City and collect its loot
stellarity.advancements.dilute_breath.de: Throw Dragon's Breath into a Water Cauldron to dilute it. You can then toss in different items to do a little bit of brewing!
stellarity.advancements.dragonborn.descr: Obtain the Dragonblade, a mythical sword of a truly unknown origin
stellarity.advancements.duskberry_find.d: Pick up a Duskberry from a Chest in Hallow's End Ship
stellarity.advancements.dye_elytra.descr: Combine an Elytra with any Dye to change its flight trail
stellarity.advancements.electrified.desc: Dash through 5 different mobs with a single Copper Elektra Shield dash
stellarity.advancements.fae_flayer.descr: Move an Altar of The Sacred to the Overworld, then summon and kill the Empress during the day
stellarity.advancements.find_end_village: Stranded in The Sea of Eternity
Find a Village in the middle of nowhere
stellarity.advancements.god_slayer.descr: You have proven yourself worthy by defeating the vicious Beast twice
stellarity.advancements.hallelujah.descr: Dodge an attack with a full set of Hallowed Armor
stellarity.advancements.harvester.abilit: Absorbed souls restore health and hunger, even if the sword doesn't gain any damage from them
Super cold aura slows nearby mobs, with the effect getting stronger closer to the player

Using a Totem of Undying encases you in a protective ice barrier which grants immunity to all incoming damage and immense healing for its duration. After the effect expires, a large explosion will damage all nearby mobs. Cooldown of 60 seconds
Attacks will deal extra unmitigated damage after a short while
Hit mobs take extra damage from all sources for some time
Killing any mobs gives Absorption and damage reduction
Attacks burn enemies for extra damage. Fiery mobs take extra damage from the debuff
Attacks have a chance to apply a stacking defense reduction effect
stellarity.advancements.harvester.all_ab: ᴛɪᴘ: ᴏɴᴇ ʜᴀʀᴠᴇsᴛᴇʀ ᴄᴀɴ ᴏɴʟʏ ɢᴇᴛ 3 ᴀʙɪʟɪᴛɪᴇs, sᴏ ɢᴇᴛ ᴀ ғᴇᴡ ғᴏʀ ᴛʜᴇ ᴄᴏᴍᴘʟᴇᴛɪᴏɴ ᴏғ ᴛʜɪs ᴄʜᴀʟʟᴇɴɢᴇ
stellarity.advancements.harvester.gain_d: Kill any mob to slightly upgrade a Harvester
stellarity.advancements.harvester.max_ou: Even the grim power of this ice sword has its limits...
stellarity.advancements.i_am_titanium.de: Craft a full set of Shulker Armor
stellarity.advancements.imbuements.descr: Use Dragon's Breath to brew a Lingering Potion
stellarity.advancements.jeb_.description: Craft all color variants of Shulker Boxes
stellarity.advancements.journeys_end.des: Use 12 Eyes of Ender to activate the End Portal
stellarity.advancements.kaliyah.descript: Deal maximum damage possible with a single Dragonblade punch
stellarity.advancements.kaliyah.tip: ᴛɪᴘ: ᴋɴᴏᴄᴋʙᴀᴄᴋ ᴇɴᴄʜᴀɴᴛᴍᴇɴᴛ ɪɴᴄʀᴇᴀsᴇs ᴘᴜɴᴄʜ ᴅᴀᴍᴀɢᴇ
stellarity.advancements.keep_warm.descri: Wear a full set of Leather Armor in any of the coldest biomes of The End
stellarity.advancements.kill_dragon.desc: The Beast is dead and The End is waiting for you to discover its secrets...
stellarity.advancements.kill_large_phant: Kill a Phantom that is bigger than usually
stellarity.advancements.kill_shulker.des: Kill a Shulker for its Shells
stellarity.advancements.night_sky_stalke: Kill a Phantom. They will vanish as soon as you get some sleep
stellarity.advancements.otherwordly_bota: Plant a Chorus Flower in every dimension
stellarity.advancements.poor_life_choice: Eat, plant and feed a Fox a Duskberry
stellarity.advancements.postmortal_2.des: Save yourself from death in The Void with a Totem of Undying
stellarity.advancements.sacrificial_ritu: Place down 4 End Crystals on top of the 4 elevated Bedrock blocks
stellarity.advancements.spirit_assasin.d: Teleport over 60 blocks with The Beginning and The End
stellarity.advancements.summon_empress.d: Sacrifice Pixie Dust at the Altar of The Sacred
stellarity.advancements.super_sonic.desc: Use Elytra to fly through a 1 by 1 gap while moving faster than 40 m/s
stellarity.advancements.the_beginning.de: Summon and kill the Wither in The End
stellarity.advancements.third_times_the_: Summon the Ender Dragon for the third time
stellarity.advancements.topped_off.descr: Increase your maximum health by eating 10 Crystal Heartfish
stellarity.advancements.transmute_item.d: Transmute an item into something different by throwing it into the water in The Hallow
stellarity.advancements.void_reels.descr: Cast your Fishing Rod into the open darkness below
stellarity.aota.warning: Su magia está sellada detrás de una poderosa bestia
stellarity.boss.eol.despawn: %s desaparece de nuevo en la luz
stellarity.config.allow_disenchanting.de: Hace que el Altar de los Malditos sea capaz de quitar encantamientos de un objeto encantado combinándolo con un libro normal. Podría considerarse un poco chetado
stellarity.config.always_generate_egg.de: Siempre genera un huevo de dragón después de matar al Ender Dragon. Si está deshabilitado, sigue las reglas vanilla de generación de solo 1 huevo y solo la primera muerte.
stellarity.config.boss_status_messages.d: Envía mensajes globales cuando un jefe de Stellarity es invocado, matado o despawneado.
stellarity.config.dragon_health.descript: Cambia la salud máxima del Ender Dragon. Máximo: 1024
stellarity.config.dragon_health.title: Vida máxima del dragón
Hace que los cristales de las ciudades del End apliquen Shock Creativo, que evita poner y quitar bloques hasta que todos sean destruidos. ¡Ten en cuenta que las ciudades del End están balanceadas en torno a la habilitación de esta opción!
Habilita Shock Creativo en las ciudades del End
stellarity.config.enable_dragon_screensh: Habilita un efecto de movimiento de pantalla de segunda mano durante la animación de aparición del dragón. Puede ser nauseabundo para algunos, así que siéntete libre de desactivarlo. De todos modos, no es lo mejor.
Habilita Sacudida de pantalla del dragón
stellarity.config.enable_end_crystal_dro: Hace que los Cristales del End se dropeen en vez de explotar.
Habilitar Drop del Cristal del End
Hace que las cabezas del tesoro se generen aleatoriamente dentro de algunos cofres de botín (El End). Sirven como pequeños y divertidos objetos de colección.
stellarity.config.eol_health.description: Cambia la salud máxima de la Emperatriz de la Luz. Máximo: 1024
stellarity.config.eol_health.title: Vida máxima de la Emperatriz de la luz
stellarity.config.join_message.descripti: Ya sea para enviar un mensaje corto sobre la carga de Stellarity al ingresar a este mundo. ¡Se pide a los desarrolladores de Modpacks que marquen el complemento 'Disable Join Message Globally'!
stellarity.config.join_message.title: Mensaje de Entrada
stellarity.config.migrate_vaults.title: stellarity.config.migrate_vaults.title
stellarity.config.nerf_elytra.descriptio: Nerfea los élitros haciendo que tomen daño adicional al impulsarse.
stellarity.config.nerf_elytra.title: Nerfear Élitros
stellarity.config.track_loop_delay.drago: Número de ticks que la música de jefe del dragón se va a repetir después. Solo edita si realmente tienes una razón para hacerlo.
Retraso en el loop de la música del dragón
stellarity.config.track_loop_delay.eol.d: Número de ticks que la música de jefe de la Emperatriz de la luz se repetirá después. Solo edita si realmente tienes una razón para hacerlo.
stellarity.config.track_loop_delay.eol.t: Retraso en el loop de la Emperatriz
stellarity.death_messages.dot.prismatic_: %1$s was burnt alive by rainbow lights
stellarity.death_messages.dragonblade.1: %1$s was punched into the otherworld by %2$s
stellarity.death_messages.dragonblade.2: %1$s was punched a bit too hard by %2$s
stellarity.death_messages.dragonblade.3: %1$s was warped into another reality by %2$s
stellarity.death_messages.eol.dash: %1$s didn't move out of the Empress of Light's way in time
stellarity.death_messages.eol.ethereal_l: %1$s was pierced through with the Empress of Light's Ethereal Lance
stellarity.death_messages.eol.prismatic_: %1$s forgot to dodge the Empress of Light's attacks
stellarity.death_messages.kaleidoscope.2: %1$s was turned inside out by %2$s's power from the sun
%1$s felt nature's revenge with help of %2$s
%1$s realized nature has no equals with help of %2$s
stellarity.death_messages.tamaris_execut: %1$s was forced to see what 999 damage is like by %2$s
%1$s had their remaning health taken away by %2$s
stellarity.explorer_map.chapel_of_light: Mapa del explorador de la Capilla de la luz
stellarity.explorer_map.end_city: Mapa del explorador de ciudades del End
stellarity.explorer_map.end_village: Mapa del explorador de las aldeas del End
stellarity.items.altar_of_light.descript: Can be placed anywhere at any time
the attention of the Fae Goddess
stellarity.items.altar_of_light.flavor_t: 'Not to be confused with Altar of The Accursed'
stellarity.items.armors.champion_armor.s: Fills you with Wrath of The Dragon,
stellarity.items.armors.floral_armor.set: Shooting an enemy will bloom a flower over
their head, which will explode shortly after
Sneak while in tall plants to blend in with them
stellarity.items.armors.hallowed_armor.s: Otorga la capacidad de esquivar ataques,
stellarity.items.armors.shulker_armor.se: Los proyectiles de Shulker cazarán a tus atacantes
Recibe menos daño cuando te atacan
stellarity.items.elytra.dragon_wings.des: at the cost of flight speed
stellarity.items.empty_enchanted_book.de: Se mueve en la dirección de una
gran abertura en uno de los pilares
stellarity.items.food.fish.goosh.descrip: Can be used in place of
stellarity.items.food.grilled_enderman_f: Carne de Enderman a la parrilla
stellarity.items.materials.enderite_shar: Contiene una fracción de lo desconocido
stellarity.items.materials.enderite_smit: Sólo utilizable en el Altar de los Malditos.
stellarity.items.materials.keys.gilded_p: Opens Ominous Vaults in End Cities
stellarity.items.materials.keys.winged.d: Opens the Elytra Vault on End Ships
stellarity.items.materials.starlight_soo: Toss it into a Cauldron with water
to allow for temporary item transmutation
stellarity.items.materials.upgrade: Se utiliza para mejorar la armadura de netherita
stellarity.items.phantom_item_frame.desc: Turns invisible when an item is put inside
stellarity.items.porta_altar.description: Right click on the ground to draw a sigil that
allows you to access Altar of The Accursed
Place in a vertical item frame attached
to create your own permanent copy of the Altar
stellarity.items.potions.amarena.descrip: Parece vino, pero en realidad no lo es
stellarity.items.spellbooks.conveyance.d: te teletransporta al primer bloque que golpea
stellarity.items.spellbooks.light.descri: Haz clic derecho para invocar un aura amistosa
que otorga curación y reducción de daño
a todos los jugadores cercanos dentro
stellarity.items.spellbooks.obstruct.des: Sends up a tough shulker wall
stellarity.items.spellbooks.updraft.desc: Haz clic derecho para impulsarte hacia arriba
con una ligera ráfaga de viento, dándote
la capacidad de deslizarse libremente durante un corto tiempo
stellarity.items.trinkets.copper_elektra: Sneak to perform an elektrifying dash!
Can charge up to 3 dashes every 7 seconds
Third dash takes longer to recharge
Dashing through mobs halves recharge time
stellarity.items.trinkets.crest_of_the_e: to your next attack in retaliation
stellarity.items.trinkets.soaring_insign: Sneak and look up/down to adjust height
stellarity.items.trinkets.starstruck_shi: Stars will fall after blocking damage
stellarity.items.trinkets.void_locket.de: Can be imbued with any gem
on the Altar of The Accursed
stellarity.items.weapons.call_of_the_voi: enemy HP and shatter on impact
stellarity.items.weapons.dragonblade.des: A fearsome sword with an otherwordly punch!
stellarity.items.weapons.dragonblade.fla: 'It came from the edge of The End'
stellarity.items.weapons.harvester.descr: Absorbs souls of slain mobs and permanently
Certains souls imbue it with magical abilities
The more souls it absorbs, the less damage it gets
The more souls it absorbs, the less damage it gets
stellarity.items.weapons.kaleidoscope.de: Channels power from the core of the sun
Strike enemies to release stored energy
all at once in a powerful discharge
stellarity.items.weapons.prismatic_punch: and set mobs on Prismatic Inferno
stellarity.items.weapons.prismember.desc: Sneak to charge up a fiery spin,
igniting all nearby mobs and setting
stellarity.items.weapons.sandstorm_tride: 'he didn't want to do a portal gun'
stellarity.items.weapons.sharanga.descri: Spectral Arrows travel in a straight
stellarity.items.weapons.slayer_crossbow: with infinite pierce, but limited range
stellarity.items.weapons.spectral_fury.d: which seek out and attack mobs
stellarity.items.weapons.spirit_dagger.d: Hold %s in the other hand and look
at them to teleport to their location,
damaging all mobs and gaining a short buff
stellarity.items.weapons.starless_scythe: Part of dealt damage is converted into healing
Can damage multiple mobs in one swing
stellarity.items.weapons.stellar_striker: Attack or kill mobs to collect stars
Sneak and attack to send the stars flying
all at once to deal high burst damage
stellarity.items.weapons.tamaris.descrip: a nearby enemy with low health
stellarity.messages.cmd.fix_markers: Se arreglaron todos los marcadores cargados de Stellarity
stellarity.messages.cmd.generate_end_isl: Características de la Isla del End generadas manualmente
stellarity.messages.cmd.reset_config_to_: Todas las configuraciones se han reiniciado a por defecto
stellarity.messages.cmd.uninstall: Se removieron todos los marcadores, equipos y bossbars de Stellarity registrados
stellarity.void_fishing.warning.dragons_: Ningún pez se atreve a entrar en esta área...
stellarity.void_fishing.warning.too_deep: Algo te dice que deberías pescar más arriba...
